sections.heading: Overview
content:
A California-licensed acupuncturist and a doctor of Oriental medicine
specializing in gynecology and reproductive medicine, Daoshing Ni, DOM, PhD, is
president of Yo San University of Traditional Chinese Medicine and a teacher
and practitioner of TCM. A 38th-generation practitoner of TCM, Ni was trained
throughout his childhood by his father, Master Ni Hua Ching.

Ni earned his doctorate in Oriental medicine at Samra University and did his
postgraduate residency at Beijing College of Traditional Chinese Medicine and
Nanjing College of Traditional Chinese Medicine in China. He studied
extensively under renowned Chinese gynecologist Dr. Zhi Yu Wang. Ni is the
author of Crane-Style Chi Gong and Its Therapeutic Effects.
